about_the_game:
Roll, jump, ride, glide and fly in this platformer racing game. All from inside a crystal ball!

Unlike most vehicles, a ball does not have a front end; rather, its front end is where its speeding towards!

No need to steer a car back and forth. You can turn around and build up speed in any direction you wish. Racing through platforming sections; even vertically.

Drive masterfully using simple and intuitive controls to keep your speed high with up to 5 strangers or friends.

Crystal Ball Critters features beautiful environments and worlds to race across. Full of original gimmicks and secrets to keep things fresh and stay ahead of the race. All matter of colorful critters competing for recognition from the most evil (actually nicest) villain that the universe has ever had.

All you need is a jumping and rolling to access all of the game's movement. But controlling that movement to its full potential and maintaining your speed flawlessly is an art of its own.

Across the worlds of Crystal Ball Critters, you will encounter Mana Orbs.

Picking one up will give you a burst of speed; giving you an opportunity to turn instantly and change your trajectory, allowing skilled players to make sharp turns without slowing down, and rewarding skill in ways that don't require any strange input or training!

All of it comes naturally by playing.

Perfect for players looking to jump straight into a game without waiting, and also those that want to hone their skill for faster and faster times in the solo modes!

✦ What This Game Is Not

  • A Car Racing Game On A Linear Track.

  • A platformer with several buttons to map to your controller.

✦ What This Game Is

  • A ball game that takes the race on all sort of terrain. Ascending obstacles while managing your speed.

  • An easy to get into multiplayer game for anyone with a computer or a console.

  • A game with intuitive and simple control schemes, but that rewards skill and using them to perfection. Where precision is what allows you to control your momentum across the platforming.

  • A beautiful world crafted with love and charming characters.

What are you waiting for?

short_description: Crystal Ball Critters is a multiplayer ball-racing game, in which you race your friends through our antagonist's carefully thought out multiverse of adventures! Play by yourself or against up to 4 of your friends to find out who can beat each stage first.
